comments:
Build ID: v200706151545

Steps To Reproduce:
1. Select several projects
2. Copy
3. Paste
4. Enter new project names when requested

A NPE is thrown.

More information:
NPE when copying a series of projects (info is null):

I cannot reproduce that, but the only reason it can happen is that parameter in this method is null.

Hi!

Unfortunately I cannot reproduce this at the moment--neither with 4.0, not with latest HEAD. It just happend once.

Here are additional stacktraces that look very similar. This time it happend when an application is started and closed very soon (actually a UI-less application).
